sentences.en: And other side, here broadleaf natural resources is very substantial however.
sentences.cn: 而另方面, 这里阔叶树资源却很丰富.

sentences.en: And that of broadleaf tree specieswere occupied 13 % and 15 % respectively.
sentences.cn: 阔叶树种(黄栌、火炬树)则分别占全天和白天的13%和14%.

sentences.en: Annual broadleaf and grass weeds are major problems.
sentences.cn: 主要杂草是一年生阔叶杂草和禾本科杂草.

sentences.en: Aphrodisium faldermannii rufiventris Gressitt is an important pest of broadleaf trees.
sentences.cn: 红腹柄天牛是阔叶树的重要害虫之一.

sentences.en: Broadleaf evergreen shrub such as laurel, rhododendron, etc.
sentences.cn: 阔叶长绿灌木,如月桂 、 北美杜鹃花等.

sentences.en: Broadleaf evergreen tree such as evergreen magnolia, castor tree, etc.
sentences.cn: 阔叶长绿树包括长绿木兰 、 蓖麻树等等.

sentences.en: Broadleaf hedge such as laurel, spirea, photinia, etc.
sentences.cn: 阔叶树篱,如月桂 、 绣线菊 、 光叶石楠等.

sentences.en: Drag onto the page to add a broadleaf evergreen shrub, such as laurel or rhododendron.
sentences.cn: 拖到绘图页后,可以添加阔叶长绿灌木, 如月桂或北美杜鹃花.

sentences.en: Drag onto the page to add a broadleaf hedge, such as laurel, spirea, or photinia.
sentences.cn: 拖到绘图页后,可以添加阔叶树篱, 如月桂 、 绣线菊或光叶石楠.

sentences.en: Hardwood and broadleaf forest ? → ? Evergreen brosdleaf forest.
sentences.cn: 其演替规律为:裸地或瘠薄空旷地→黄山松林→黄山松+落叶阔叶树混交林→落叶阔叶林→常绿阔叶林.

sentences.en: In the broadleaf forest communities, the broadleaf pollen percentages are near 40%, the conifer are less than 15% while the shrubs and herbs are less than 50%.
sentences.cn: 在阔叶林植被中，阔叶树种花粉百分比约40%，针叶树种花粉百分比低于15%，灌丛和草本花粉百分比小于50%。

sentences.en: In the conifer forest communities, the conifer pollen percentages are more than 60%, broadleaf are less than 10% while shrubs and herbs are less than 30%.
sentences.cn: 在针叶林植被中， 针叶树种花粉百分比高于60%，阔叶树种花粉百分比低于10%，灌丛和草本花粉百分比低于30%。

sentences.en: In the process of secondary succession from conifer - broadleaf forest to broadleaf forest , species richness fluctuated remarkably.
sentences.cn: 在针阔混交林向阔叶林演替过程中, 物种丰富度指数表现为较大的波动性.

sentences.en: Potato kind ( yam, potato, cassava and broadleaf plant lotus root ) it is high yield crop.
sentences.cn: 薯类 ( 红薯 、 马铃薯 、 木薯和蕉藕 ) 是高产作物.

sentences.en: This paper deals with the application prospect of ev - ergreen broadleaf trees in gardens of Shandong province.
sentences.cn: 探讨常绿阔叶树种在山东园林中的应用前景.

sentences.en: To the south Sycamore trees create a tall , broadleaf canopy.
sentences.cn: 在城区的南部,是一片树冠宽大枫树林.

sentences.en: Warm temperate zones support broadleaf evergreen forests, including laurel forests.
sentences.cn: 暖温带适合阔叶常绿林, 包括月桂树林.

trans.tran_en: any tobacco plant having broad leaves, used esp in making cigars
